themes: insufficient support for individual artists and art groups
critique of funding intermediaries (event organizers, agencies, nonprofits)
key_phrases: Direct funding for artists and art projects
more support being offered directly to artists and art groups
not just for 'event organizers' or 3rd party creative agencies or non profits
barriers_identified: funding routed through event organizers, agencies, or nonprofits instead of directly to artists
solutions_proposed: offer more support directly to artists and art groups
